welcome_message_body: Welcome to Izuo, Japan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich cultural heritage, breathtaking natural beauty, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Izuo has to offer.

restaurants.name: Starbucks岸和田三田店 (Starbucks 岸和田三田店)
restaurants.description: Starbucks岸和田三田店 (Starbucks 岸和田三田店) is a café located in 岸和田市.

restaurants.name: にぎり長次郎和泉中央店
restaurants.description: にぎり長次郎和泉中央店 is a sushi restaurant located in 和泉市.

restaurants.name: cafe MANO
restaurants.description: cafe MANO is a restaurant located in 和泉市.

restaurants.name: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店)
restaurants.description: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店) is a café located in 和泉市.

restaurants.name: 餃子の王将 和泉中央店
restaurants.description: 餃子の王将 和泉中央店 is a chinese restaurant located in 和泉市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free Wi-Fi by connecting to the network and following the instructions on the landing page.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
